* fuck Wilde (Nick Wilde): The smart fox shows up in his usual green shirt and tie.

prompts.title: Neo-Western Cowboy Key Art
prompts.prompt: Create a high-end cinematic Neo-Western cowboy movie poster–style composite portrait derived strictly from the uploaded facial reference, with absolute identity preservation and zero tolerance for deviation. The subject’s facial anatomy, bone structure, skin texture, natural pores, exact eye shape, exact eye color, exact hair color, hairline, beard density, scars, and overall facial identity must remain 100% identical to the reference photo. The composition is locked, stable, and repeatable in a vertical 2:3 aspect ratio, with a balanced theatrical layout where the main actor occupies precisely the upper 50% of the frame, and the supporting narrative elements fill the lower 50%. The main actor is framed in a Medium Close-Up (MCU) with a slight low-angle camera, body fixed in a 3/4 turn to the viewer’s left, head turned back toward center, right shoulder subtly lowered, and a controlled 5-degree downward chin tilt, producing a powerful “through-the-brow” gaze directly into the lens. Behind the main actor is a dramatic Western sky, featuring towering storm clouds, layered golden-hour light rays, subtle dust haze, and warm–cool contrast, creating epic scale and emotional tension without overpowering the subject. The outfit remains a late-19th-century outlaw ensemble: a heavy distressed dark-brown leather duster coat with visible wear and abrasion, layered over a desaturated olive-gray plaid flannel shirt worn open at the collar, paired with a charcoal-black wide-brim, high-crown felt Stetson-style cowboy hat with a studded leather band and trail-dust texture. Facial expression is stoic and resolute—eyes slightly narrowed, lips closed in a firm neutral line—projecting authority and hardened resolve. Hair remains exactly the same color and texture as the reference, dark espresso brown, short-to-medium length, tucked under the hat with natural strands visible at the temples, seamlessly blending into a salt-and-pepper beard with crisp micro-contrast. Lighting is cinematic golden hour with dual-source control: a warm directional key light from camera-left creating a Rembrandt triangle on the right cheek, combined with a clean golden rim light separating the silhouette from the sky, with deep low-key shadows under the hat brim. Color grading is modern cinematic, emphasizing warm amber highlights, crushed blacks, restrained skin tones, and subtle orange–teal separation. The lower half of the frame depicts supporting characters—multiple cowboys riding horses across an open frontier plain, smaller in scale, partially silhouetted against dust, sunset glow, and atmospheric depth. The separation between the upper main actor and lower supporting scene is achieved through a soft, seamless gradient blend of light, clouds, dust, and haze, with no hard dividing line and no text elements present. Overall style is high-end theatrical key art, iconic, cinematic, and legend-driven—evoking classic Western film posters with modern hyper-realistic finishing, optimized for consistent, repeatable results across different users.

He wears round metal-frame sunglasses, a dark brown aged leather jacket, and a black knit turtleneck. The light catches the texture of the leather and the side of his face, casting deep shadows.

prompts.title: Ultra-Luxury Tropical Cabana
prompts.prompt:
​A high-end lifestyle photograph of a man in white silk pajamas lounging on a massive outdoor daybed in a luxury beach cabana. He is surrounded by six beautiful women in elegant swimwear and white sarongs, some leaning in toward him and others standing gracefully nearby. In the foreground, a low table is overflowing with a lavish spread of tropical fruits, gourmet appetizers, colorful cocktails, and chilled champagne bottles in ice buckets. The setting is a tropical paradise at golden hour, with white curtains fluttering in the breeze, a tall palm tree, and the turquoise ocean in the background. Cinematic lighting, vibrant colors, 8k resolution, commercial travel photography style.
​Key Elements Breakdown
​If you want to modify this image, here are the "ingredients" used in the prompt:
​The Vibe: Use terms like "Ultra-luxury," "Tropical getaway," or "Opulent lifestyle" to set the mood.
​The Wardrobe: Specifying "white silk pajamas" and "white sarongs" creates that clean, coordinated aesthetic seen in the photo.
​The Foreground: Focus on "lavish food spread" and "gourmet appetizers" to ensure the AI generates the detailed table setting.
​The Lighting: "Golden hour" or "Sunset glow" is essential for that warm, soft skin tone and the orange hue on the curtains.
Use uploaded photo as reference face

prompts.title: Gravity Defying City Fall
prompts.prompt: This cheerful, gravity-defying photo was taken from the perspective of a man (), who appears to be falling from the top of a tall building at a busy city intersection. The man is captured in full motion, with one arm outstretched towards the camera and the other behind him, legs wide open and red Converse sneakers visible in the foreground. Man wears a sweater (the one in the photo) and ripped jeans. The background shows a dramatic aerial view of a vibrant cityscape, teeming with colorful cars, yellow taxis, buses and buildings painted in warm shades of orange, pink, purple and turquoise. The view is bright and clear, with natural lighting, vibrant colors, and a strong sense of depth and vertigo, as if a skyscraper was falling down. They are ultra-realistic photography, resolutions, focus, dynamic composition, cinematic effect, wide angle lenses, 3D perspective and immersive.

prompts.title: Days of Thunder Racing Poster
prompts.prompt:
A fan-created cinematic portrait inspired by the movie "Days of Thunder." A young woman from the 1980s, with fair skin and the same facial features as the uploaded image. She is wearing a gritty, dirty 2025 BMW M8 GTE racing suit covered in realistic, authentic sponsor logos. The artwork is a dramatic, high-resolution collage:
– A close-up of her intense, serious face, windswept hair, and dirt on her cheeks
– A dynamic side-profile with her wearing a racing helmet under dramatic lighting
– A full-body pose of her standing confidently in the racing suit, hands on hips, bold posture
– In the background, a 2025 BMW M8 GTE race car drifting through a corner at high speed, tires smoking, motion blur emphasizing speed
The composition has a cinematic lighting setup with intense contrast, lens flares, and vibrant but moody color grading. The finish is glossy and highly detailed like a professional movie poster. The visual tone is adrenaline-fueled, dramatic, and empowering—fusing 1980s racing nostalgia with futuristic motorsport aesthetics. Poster-like design in ultra-sharp 8K resolution.

prompts.title: Extreme Zipline Disaster
prompts.prompt: Hyper-realistic extreme adventure close-up portrait of a man. The man is ziplining at the exact moment the safety rope snaps and breaks mid-air. The broken safety cable is clearly visible, frayed and whipping backward, frozen in motion to emphasize danger. Camera shot using an action camera, eye-level perspective, wide-angle / fisheye lens, slightly tilted frame for added chaos. Dynamic dramatic angle from above, creating a strong sense of depth and vertigo. Background far below shows a rocky canyon / steep stone gorge, massive jagged cliffs, deep ravine, raw natural textures, extreme height perception. Below the canyon is a turquoise natural lake with large scattered rocks, surrounded by dense tropical green forest, forming dramatic vertical stripe patterns that curve and visually encircle the subject when viewed from above. The man is wearing: helmet and full safety gear, black hand gloves, beige cargo shorts, adidas ultraboost white. Expression: pure panic and shock, mouth wide open shouting, eyes wide, intense fear visible. Pose: right hand holding an action camera stick, arm tense, left arm outstretched instinctively, fingers spread, losing balance. Bright midday sunlight, clear blue sky, strong natural highlights and shadows. Sharp focus on the subject, ultra-detailed textures (skin, fabric, rope fibers, rock surfaces). Cinematic color grading, vivid colors, high contrast, extreme adventure mood, raw realism. Ultra-realistic photography, cinematic action still, dynamic motion freeze, dramatic perspective. Vertical composition 9:16, 16K ultra-HD resolution, crystal clear.

prompts.title: Under-Construction Statue at Chennai Roundabout
prompts.prompt: Create a giant hyper-realistic statue based on the given photo of a mature Indian man in a black formal shirt, keeping the original face exactly the same without changes. The statue stands tall in the middle of a roundabout in Chennai, near a famous historical landmark like the Marina Beach Lighthouse. The statue is 82% completed, with most of its structure detailed and finished, while the remaining 18% is still under construction, surrounded by scaffolding. A few construction workers in blue helmets and orange vests are welding, climbing, and finishing the final sections. Only some small exposed metal framework is visible on the unfinished part. The background shows the realistic atmosphere of Hyderabad: crowded streets with colorful rickshaws, buzzing motorcycles, and small cars circling the roundabout. Street vendors with tea stalls, fruit carts, and colorful umbrellas line the roadside. Shop signs, big billboards, and messy hanging electric wires crisscross above the streets, creating the typical Indian city vibe. The bright daytime sky shines above, with tropical trees and a bustling, lively atmosphere. 4:5 Instagram-standard aspect ratio.

prompts.title: Stormborn Strength Cinematic Portrait
prompts.prompt:
Ultra-realistic cinematic portrait photograph of a young woman (upload image) in side profile facing left, intense yet calm expression, embodying strength and solitude. Natural realistic skin texture with visible pores, subtle soft lips, soft natural blush.
Strong wind blowing her long auburn hair violently backward, individual strands flying freely, wild and untamed, some strands crossing her face and neck.
She wears a flowing dress in deep magenta and dark purple tones, fabric whipped by the wind, dramatic folds and motion, realistic textile detail.
Environment: raw African savanna during an approaching storm — tall dry grasses bending in the wind, swirling dust and sand particles in the air, cracked earth beneath.
Background: massive storm clouds rolling across the sky, dark dramatic clouds with breaks of golden light piercing through, distant lightning illuminating the horizon, silhouettes of acacia trees barely visible through dust and haze.
Lighting: cinematic high-contrast lighting, dramatic rim light outlining her profile, warm highlights against cool storm shadows, volumetric light through dust and clouds.
Mood: wild, powerful, dramatic, poetic solitude, survival, connection to untamed nature.
Shot on professional cinema camera, 85mm lens, f/1.8, shallow depth of field, HDR, hyperrealistic, ultra-detailed, RAW photo, 8k resolution

prompts.title: Emerald Royal Saree Jewelry
prompts.prompt: Create a hyper-realistic image of a female model wearing a stunning emerald-studded necklace with matching earrings and bracelet. The model is dressed in a royal silk saree with golden zari work, seated elegantly on a marble bench in a palace garden. The lighting should consist of soft golden spotlights and natural daylight to highlight the vibrant emeralds and the intricate saree fabric. Use a Canon EOS R5 with an 85mm f/1.2 lens to capture a full-body shot at a 45° angle. The backdrop is a luxurious palace garden with ornate sculptures and flowing fountains in the blur. The color palette transitions from emerald greens to golds and soft pastels. The jewelry should glimmer with soft, clean reflections. Add a brand logo in the bottom right corner with the tagline "[Brand Name]". Place the product code and pricing QR in the lower left. Mood: regal, elegant, and sophisticated. Ideal for royal wedding campaigns.

prompts.title: Emerald Lehenga Jewelry Editorial
prompts.prompt: Create a hyper-realistic image of a woman wearing an emerald-studded choker with matching dangler earrings and a maang tikka. The model is dressed in a velvet lehenga with intricate zari embroidery, seated gracefully on a velvet antique couch. The lighting should consist of a warm golden spotlight from above paired with soft fill lights to highlight the shimmer of the emeralds and the texture of the fabric. Use a Canon EOS R5 with an 85mm f/1.2 lens to capture a full-body fashion shot at a 45° angle. The backdrop is a royal palace with golden columns blurred in the background. The color palette transitions from golden tones to deep greens, adding depth and richness. The jewelry sparkles with dramatic highlights on every gemstone. Add the brand logo in the bottom right corner. Ideal for fashion magazine campaigns.

prompts.title: Holographic Editorial Identity Portrait
prompts.prompt: Using the uploaded image as reference, create a stylized editorial portrait that preserves the subject's exact facial features, proportions, and identity with no beautification or alteration. Render the skin and upper body as if sculpted from iridescent, holographic metallic material, with smooth reflective surfaces that shift between deep blues, purples, and subtle gold highlights under controlled studio lighting. prompts.title: Indian Festival Garba Celebration
prompts.prompt: A vibrant Indian festival street scene filled with swirling movement and joyful chaos. Place me in the celebration, dancing among fans wearing bright blue jerseys as they perform Garba, waving flags and twirling dandiya sticks. Clouds of red, green, purple, and yellow gulal burst through the air, mixing with warm golden festival lights. Surround us with authentic Indian decor: marigold garlands strung overhead, rangoli patterns on the ground, hand-painted shop signs in Hindi or Gujarati, and glowing clay diyas lining the street. Include dancers dressed in colorful chaniya cholis and kediyus with mirrorwork embroidery, ghungroo anklets, and flowing dupattas. Add musicians playing dhol and nagada drums in the background. The atmosphere should feel immersive and distinctly Indian—dusty sunlit haze, vibrant pigments drifting through the air, and dynamic circular Garba formations. At the top of the scene, include a glowing banner reading 'Chak De India' in elegant English calligraphy. The entire image should feel lively, culturally authentic, high-energy, and richly textured, like a cinematic festival moment frozen in time.

prompts.title: Mithila Folk Painting Transformation
prompts.prompt: Transform the input image into an authentic Mithila (Madhubani) folk painting. Keep the subject recognizable but rendered in flat 2D forms with bold black outlines, double-line borders, and dense geometric patterns. If a person is present, keep them recognizable through flat 2D forms; otherwise, reinterpret the scene entirely using bold outlines, dense geometric patterns, symbolic motifs, and traditional natural-dye colors. Fill all background space with traditional birds, fish, flowers, and vines using natural dye colors—ochre, lampblack, indigo, turmeric. Show textured handmade paper, visible pigment grain, no shadows, fully saturated earthy tones, and intricate cross-hatching throughout.

prompts.title: Jaipur Block Print Textile Portrait
prompts.prompt: Reimagine the subject seamlessly woven into an intricate block printed textile inspired by Jaipur craftsmanship. If a person is present, preserve their real face and natural expression while allowing their silhouette to emerge gently from repeating patterns of paisleys, florals, and geometric forms. Otherwise, let the scene dissolve fully into repeating paisleys, florals, and geometric forms with visible woodblock texture. Use deep madder red, turmeric yellow, and indigo blue arranged in rhythmic layers that feel hand composed rather than perfectly uniform. Let the fabric appear both worn and lived in, with visible woodblock textures, slight misalignments, and subtle ink variations that reveal the human process behind the print. The subject or scene should feel as though it is becoming part of it, dissolving into pattern while remaining recognizable. The overall image should feel tactile, warm, and timeless, celebrating craft, repetition, and quiet beauty rather than a literal scene or setting.

prompts.title: Kanjeevaram Silk Landscape Portrait
prompts.prompt: Reimagine the subject within a continuous landscape of flowing Kanjeevaram silk, where clothing and environment merge into a single, seamless form. Preserve the person's real face and natural expression while letting the fabric sculpt both the body and the surrounding space. Draw from the visual language of South Indian temple architecture, with bold color fields arranged like layered stone terraces and woven borders echoing traditional motifs. Metallic zari threads should shimmer gently through the silk, catching light like sacred rivers moving across the terrain. The fabric should feel heavy, luminous, and richly woven, folding and unfolding to create depth, rhythm, and quiet movement. The final image should feel immersive and meditative, rooted in craft, heritage, and timeless elegance rather than a literal setting.

prompts.title: Traditional Indian Editorial Full Portrait
prompts.prompt: Transform the person in the uploaded photo into a full-length traditional Indian portrait while preserving their real face, skin tone, age, hairstyle shape, and natural expression exactly (no beautification). Place them in a neutral, relaxed full-body pose unrelated to the source image—standing straight with arms at the sides or a soft symmetrical stance with hands loosely near the front. Set the scene in a premium, minimal studio with a warm sand-toned textured backdrop, soft gradients, gentle diffused shadows, and warm ambient editorial lighting. Dress them in a fun, culturally authentic Indian outfit chosen from playful yet realistic options: a pastel chikankari kurta set, a handloom cotton or linen kurta with subtle jacquard texture, a bandhgala in muted jewel tones, or a vibrant saree (cotton, chanderi, banarasi, kanjeevaram, kota doria, ajrakh, or kalamkari) with a clean regional drape. Use lively but tasteful colors (ivory, saffron, aquamarine, soft pinks, pastel blues, muted jewel tones). Keep accessories minimal and natural (simple watch, bangles, studs, or jhumkas), simple mojaris or sandals if visible. Ensure true fabric realism—visible weave, embroidery depth, natural folds, correct drape and pleats—so it feels worn, joyful, and authentic, not costume-like.

Eu uso uma camiseta preta solta, jeans escuros soltos com dobras na parte inferior e tênis Nike preto e branco. Os acessórios usados incluem um relógio preto. Minha mão esquerda descansou casualmente em sua coxa, enquanto sua mão direita descansou na moto enquanto segurava um capacete preto brilhante com uma viseira transparente.
A moto parece detalhada com um motor grande, quadro forte e detalhes cromados brilhantes, acentuando a impressão moderna e poderosa. O fundo mostra árvores altas com luz natural suave, criando uma mistura equilibrada de sombra e luz. A expressão é calma e confiante, olhando diretamente para
a câmera. O estilo geral é cinematográfico e moderno, combinando a sensação de streetwear jovem com a presença de uma motocicleta arrojada. Alta resolução, estilo editorial fotorrealista.

prompts.title: Black and White Power Suit Portrait
prompts.prompt: Uma foto realista com todos os traços e linhas idênticos ao da foto com um semblante imponente, em preto em branco, no traje de terno preto e gravata slim.

prompts.title: Cinematic Woman and Horse Portrait
prompts.prompt:
A cinematic, mid-length portrait, capturing a female figure with a strong and elegant presence, standing next to a horse. The subject faces the camera, with a direct and confident gaze. One hand gently holds the horse's halter or head, conveying a calm and powerful connection with the animal.
She wears a long-sleeved shirt in a neutral tone (beige, khaki, or light gray), with the top buttons undone to create a V-neckline. The bottoms are earthy-colored pants (brown or khaki), complemented by a brown leather belt with a large, prominent gold buckle (possibly with the letter 'V'). A gold chain hangs from the belt loops, adding a touch of glamour. The look is adorned with multiple bracelets on both wrists, combining metals and natural materials.
Her hair is long, with voluminous waves and a natural look, as if gently blown by the wind, framing her face. The makeup is natural yet defined, enhancing the beauty of her features. Beside her, a brown horse with a white marking on its face looks forward, in harmony with the figure.
The background is an open field, such as a prairie or a valley, with a cloudy sky and the landscape in the background gently blurred, creating a sense of vastness. The lighting is natural and diffuse, typical of an overcast day, resulting in soft shadows and light that flatters the face and body.
Camera Settings: Captured with a prime portrait lens (e.g., 85mm f/1.8 or 105mm f/1.4) on a full-frame camera for optimal compression and creamy bokeh. Aperture set between f/2.0 and f/2.8 to perfectly isolate the subject and horse from the background. ISO 100-200 for maximum image quality with abundant natural light. Shutter speeds of 1/400s to 1/800s ensure absolute sharpness and freeze any subtle movement of the hair or horse. The lighting is exclusively natural, taking advantage of the soft light of an overcast sky.
Instructions for the "nano banana":
"Please use the user's reference image to capture and apply all of their facial features, facial structure, eye color, skin tone, hair style, and color with maximum fidelity. The goal is to create a version of the user in this cinematic portrait. The clothing, accessories, the pose next to the horse, the confident expression, the diffuse natural lighting, and the open field setting should be rendered as described, creating a perfect fusion between the user's identity and the aesthetics of the image."

prompts.title: Man and Lion Spiritual Bond
prompts.prompt:
Create a realistic and emotional scene showing a man (use the provided image for accurate facial features) and a lion face to face in a moment of connection and respect. The man's eyes are closed, with a serene expression, while the lion gently rests its forehead and muzzle against his, conveying trust and a spiritual bond.
Both are standing on ground covered in light snow, with snowflakes gently falling. The man wears a dark coat and hair slightly tousled by the wind, and the lion displays a thick, majestic mane.
In the background, a cold, misty natural landscape with blurred mountains and gray tones reinforces the calm and powerful atmosphere.
The lighting is soft and diffuse, highlighting the textures of the skin, fur, and coat, creating a cinematic and poetic atmosphere.
The composition should convey friendship, courage, and harmony between man and nature.
Suggested settings:
Style: Ultra-realistic, cinematic, 8K
Lighting: Soft, diffuse, natural winter light
Camera: Medium close-up, focus on expressions
Emotion: Connection, respect, tranquility
Setting: Falling snow, blurred background with mountains

prompts.title: Studio Orange Fashion Portrait
prompts.prompt:
Studio photography of a me in a black suit, black turtleneck and round sunglasses with translucent yellow lenses.
Vibrant orange background.
Unique poses from the front.

prompts.title: Black and White Editorial Male Portrait
prompts.prompt:
Recreate this scene using my submitted photo as a reference, maintaining the same framing, pose, lighting, and style as the example image.
The composition should show a half-length **male** portrait, with the model sitting and leaning slightly forward. The right arm should cross the body, with the left hand resting gently on the opposite arm, conveying elegance and confidence.
The facial expression should be serene, confident, and slightly enigmatic. The gaze should be directed toward the camera, with lips softly closed and a firm posture.
The outfit consists of a dark, sophisticated ensemble—a structured **black blazer** worn over a **fitted black shirt (or T-shirt/sweater)**. **The hair should be neatly groomed and styled appropriately for a man (e.g., short, slicked back, or a modern cut and wearing Sunglasses).**
The lighting should be studio-style, with soft, contrasting directional light (Rembrandt-style or sidelight), highlighting the contours of the face, creating elegant shadows and a subtle gradient in the background.
The background should be smooth and neutral, in dark gray tones, with slight depth and no distracting elements. 
The final style should be black and white, with refined contrast, smooth skin texture, and a realistic editorial portrait look.
Vertical format (1080x1920), portrait aspect ratio, professional studio photo quality, and a cinematic, realistic finish.

prompts.title: Vintage Cinematic Car Interior Portrait
prompts.prompt: Create a hyper-realistic portrait of a man (man of the uploaded photo) sitting in the driver's seat of a car, wearing a black shirt, combined with a faded light gray jacket and light gray wide-leg pants. White shoes should be visible, complementing the casual look. Round sunglasses with dark lenses should be positioned on the nose, highlighting a confident and slightly ironic facial expression. Relaxed posture: one arm on the sports steering wheel, the other supporting the head, conveying a relaxed look. The interior of the car should include side windows showing urban scenery (trees, buildings and part of another vehicle), and a black textured seat. Soft natural lighting, simulating daylight coming through the windows, creating a contrast between the warm colors of the clothing and the neutral environment of the car. Vintage style, with desaturated tones and slightly grainy textures, evoking a nostalgic atmosphere. Dominant tones of gray, white and black, with a balance between external light and internal shadows. Slightly elevated perspective, framing that includes the top of the knees to the head, with the steering wheel partially visible on the right.

prompts.title: Polaroid Flash Couple Snapshot
prompts.prompt: Take a photo taken with a Polaroid camera. The photo should look like an ordinary photograph, without an explicit subject or property. The photo should have a slight blur and a consistent light source, like a flash from a dark room, scattered throughout the photo. Don't change the face. Change the background behind those two people with white curtains. With that boy and me make a cute poses. Make the boy holding a red coca cola can and girl a burger.

prompts.title: Turquoise Editorial Studio Portrait
prompts.prompt:
Crie uma imagem hiper-realista baseada na minha imagem de referência (Imagem 1), preservando meus traços e aparência originais, mas recriando fielmente o estilo, roupa, pose, iluminação e cenário da imagem modelo.
personagem (baseado na minha foto) aparece em plano médio, voltado levemente para a direita, com o rosto inclinado e olhar firme em direção à câmera.
A expressão é confiante e neutra, transmitindo presença e estilo.
Ele veste uma jaqueta de couro turquesa, moderna e ajustada, com textura realista e brilho suave típico do couro tratado.
ziper e os botões metálicos devem refletir a luz com realismo e sutileza, mantendo o aspecto de fotografia de moda profissional.
Nos olhos, óculos escuros espelhados azul-petróleo, com reflexos sutis do ambiente — realçando a estética urbana.
fundo é monocromático, em tom turquesa idêntico à jaqueta, criando um visual harmonioso e de alto contraste com a pele.
💡 Iluminação de estúdio profissional:
Luz principal (key light) suave e frontal, vinda levemente da esquerda, com difusor grande (softbox 120 cm).
Luz secundária de preenchimento (fill light) neutra do lado direito, reduzindo sombras e mantendo textura facial.
Luz de recorte (rim light) sutil no ombro e cabelo, criando separação do fundo.
Temperatura de cor balanceada (5500K) — luz branca natural de estúdio.
Sombras limpas e controladas, mantendo foco no rosto e na jaqueta.
📷 Câmera e Lente:
Sony A7R IV, lente 85mm f/1.8, ISO 100, obturador 1/160s, abertura f/2.
Foco absoluto no rosto, fundo suavemente desfocado (bokeh leve).
🎨 Color grading e estilo visual:
Estilo Modern Editorial Cool Tone:
Paleta dominada por tons turquesa, azul e pele quente neutra.
Contraste alto e nitidez refinada, mas sem perder naturalidade.
Cores vibrantes e limpas, sem granulação perceptível.
Textura realista de pele e cabelo, com brilho controlado.
Reflexos metálicos sutis no zíper e nos óculos.
Tom visual: elegante, vibrante e urbano — como capa de revista ou campanha de moda contemporânea.
Filtro: Cinematic Cool HDR, com cores saturadas e luz de estúdio limpa.
Ambiente: fundo monocromático turquesa, estúdio moderno, luz balanceada.
Palavras-chave visuais:
--ultra realistic --studio lighting --8k --HDR contrast --photo realism --vibrant tones --depth of field --sharp focus --fashion editorial --turquoise tones --clean background --modern portrait --soft shadows --bokeh background --studio quality --skin texture detail --leather jacket
🎬 Notas do Diretor de Fotografia:
A chave visual é o equilíbrio entre o turquesa saturado e a pele natural, sem que nenhuma cor domine a outra.
A luz suave e frontal garante textura na pele e brilho uniforme na jaqueta.
enquadramento em plano médio com leve inclinação do rosto transmite carisma e estilo.
resultado deve parecer uma foto de revista de moda internacional (GQ, Vogue Men, Balmain Campaign) — idêntica em cor, luz e composição à original, mas com você como protagonista.

prompts.title: Cinematic Window Reflection Portrait
prompts.prompt: A cinematic close-up portrait of a stylish individual standing by a large glass window, gazing thoughtfully at their reflection. The person wears a black turtleneck sweater layered under a fitted dark blazer, creating a sleek and elegant look. The lighting is soft and natural, coming from the window, gently illuminating one side of the face while casting subtle shadows on the other, emphasizing depth and texture. The background is softly blurred, highlighting the calm and introspective mood of the scene. The reflection in the glass adds a sense of duality and contemplation. The overall atmosphere is moody, sophisticated, and cinematic, with a color palette dominated by neutral tones and soft daylight.

prompts.title: Elegant White Studio Power Portrait
prompts.prompt: A beautiful, confident woman wearing a black suit sits elegantly on a luxurious white chair that highlights her slim, graceful figure. Her right hand rests gently beneath her chin, with her chin slightly raised in a pose of self-assurance. Her head tilts subtly to the right, eyes steady and looking forward with confidence. Her facial features glow under high-quality cinematic lighting, enhancing her natural beauty. The background is pure white, featuring a rare art painting and soft, cinematic illumination. Beside the chair stands a unique white table topped with a black coffee cup and a stylish lamp decor, creating a refined and elegant atmosphere.
